mapper.select: SELECT A.RESULT_DATE -- 측정 일자 , A.RESULT_TIME -- 측정 시간 , C.RESULT -- 측정 결과 FROM RESULT A INNER JOIN ITEM B ON A.ITEM_ID = B.ITEM_ID AND B.ITEM_ID = #{itemId} INNER JOIN RESULT_DETAIL C ON A.RESULT_SEQ = C.RESULT_SEQ WHERE A.ADMISSION_ID = #{admissionId} AND A.RESULT_DATE = #{resultDate};
